summary: The script provides a training pipeline for fine-tuning a Stable Diffusion 3 model using DreamBooth with LoRA adapters. It includes data loading, model preparation, optimizer setup, training loops, checkpointing, and optional logging.
business_intent: Enable users to fine-tune a Stable Diffusion 3 model with DreamBooth and LoRA adapters for customized image generation, providing a ready-to-use training workflow.
